ngiemboon: N kwǎŋ ngie pi gẅɔ̌ gʉa mbà à tǒ.
en: I think by the time you left, he was  here.

ngiemboon: Pege lɔɔn ńgwɔ páʼɔɔn ńdʉʼʉ léfaʼ, mbà pege tè pfɛ́ɛ mmó wɔ́.
en: If we refuse to work beforehand, we will not have to eat.

ngiemboon: Mbʉ̀ŋ kwɔ́ʼɔ páʼɔɔn, ńgwɔ́ gie n dɔɔn ńgʉa tà ńkúu mbʉ̀a tá é lú, anò poŋo wɔ́ɔn.
en: It's threatening to rain like this, if I get home before it rains I'll like it.

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ late pɛ́ʼɛ̀, ńgwɔ́ gie à lɔɔn ńgʉa, ɔ̀ gÿo lêkɔ́?
en: What will you do if, by delaying like this, he leaves?
k. skin disease caused by thunder

ngiemboon: Te cʉ́ʼʉ légɔɔn nò ńnéŋ ngwɔ̀ʼ mǒ.
en: This should not be said by amplifying.
